description:
As AI becomes more and more prevalent in our world, you may be wondering how it can help you save time and be more productive. One of the best consumer uses of AI is ChatGPT, OpenAI’s chatbot that can help you create content, brainstorm ideas, outline projects, and much more. If you’re not sure where to get started with ChatGPT, check out this Introduction to ChatGPT, now just $16.97 for a few more days.

This 25-hour certification course is taught by the Internatio
title: Get this intro to ChatGPT for just $17 this week only

description:
In the market for a new laptop? You don’t have to break the bank if you’re willing to buy refurbished. During our price drop you can get a refurbished 2017 Apple MacBook Air for more than $700 off the original price.

title: This refurbished MacBook Air is more than $700 off
